title: I reinstalled some Wacom Tablet drivers and now League is broken.
body:
I have reinstalled and ran League as admin. It seems like the download link is giving me the old client as during installation it says League runs on Adobe Air and it uses the old League icon. 

https://imgur.com/a/bNURz

This keeps popping up each time I try to run it.

replies.body:
Huh, that's strange that updating a tablet driver messed up League. Regardless, we should be able to fix that up pretty easily by following the steps in the image below. Let me know if this doesn't help and I can dig a little deeper for ya!

https://i.gyazo.com/fbe5976243158ecce7efef172951e219.png
I'm all good now! Thank you!
